p: The viral Gag protein is the major structural protein of HIV virus particles and is produced from integrated proviruses. Therefore, we investigated the effect of compound #7 treatment on intracellular Gag-levels by p24 ELISA and by western blot analysis of cell lysates with antibodies raised against the Gag p24 protein (Fig. 3b, Supplementary Fig. S2). These results revealed that compound #7 strongly suppressed production of Gag (Fig. 3b).
